named-native-query.name: Message.count
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM outbox_message AS om WHERE om.scheduled_at <= :scheduled_at AND om.requeue_count >= :min_requeue_count AND om.requeue_count <= :max_requeue_count

named-native-query.name: Message.find
named-native-query.query: SELECT om.message_id, om.correlation_id, om.type, om.enqueued_at, om.scheduled_at, om.requeue_count, om.payload FROM outbox_message AS om WHERE om.message_id = :message_id

named-native-query.name: Message.findAll
named-native-query.query: SELECT om.message_id, om.correlation_id, om.type, om.enqueued_at, om.scheduled_at, om.requeue_count, om.payload FROM outbox_message AS om WHERE om.scheduled_at <= :scheduled_at AND om.requeue_count >= :min_requeue_count AND om.requeue_count <= :max_requeue_count ORDER BY om.enqueued_at ASC LIMIT :max_peek_count

named-native-query.name: Message.delete
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM outbox_message AS om WHERE om.message_id = :message_id

named-native-query.name: Message.update
named-native-query.query: UPDATE outbox_message AS om SET scheduled_at = :scheduled_at, requeue_count = :requeue_count WHERE om.message_id = :message_id
